body:
Comment 1: 
when Go 1.2 is released, the binary distributions will contain
precompiled vet tool.

and you'd better not install Go tip into a readonly directory as
tip is continuously changing.

perhaps we should install vet at make.bash time (but that will
require internet connection at build time, not something i like)
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, **go1.2**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @robpike._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
